title: Telus International AI | SDE | Bangalore
content:
**Education**: Bachelors in Engineering (Tier-1)
**Years of Experience**: 0.5 (Internships)
**Date of Offer**: February 2024
**Title**: Software Engineer 
**Company**: Telus International AI 
**Location**: Bangalore
**Salary**:  ₹20L
**Bonus**:  ₹2.6L
**Total comp** (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  ₹22.6L
**Benefits**: 15 paid vacation days + 10 paid sick leave days + ₹40k yearly budget for courses/certifications + health insurance.  
**Other details**: Negotiated Once, original offer CTC was 10% lower.

title: Intel | Software Engineer | Grade 7 | Need advice
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier 1 college
Years of Experience: 5.6
Prior Experience: Soonicorn startup
Previous Compensation: 34 Lakhs including retirals(PF, Gratuity)
Company: Intel
Title/Level: Grade 7
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: 38 Lakhs INR / Year
Signing Bonus: 8 Lakhs INR(2 Payments)
Long term cash bonus: 21 Lakhs INR for 3 years (vested yearly)
Performance Bonus: 4.5 Lakhs INR (Annual and Quarterly PB combined)
Retirals: 3 Lakhs INR(PF+Gratuity)
Total comp (Base + Performance Bonus + Long Term Cash Bonus + Signon Bonus + Special Allowance): ~58.5 LPA for 1st year
Benefits: Standard Intel Benefits
Need advice on this offer: How's work life balance at Intel. Should I join or am I lowballed ?

title: Microsoft | L64 | Offer
content:
Education: Tier 1, non-CS
Years of Experience: 8 years
Prior Experience: Good product based company, non FAANG
Current CTC: 1 cr (45 base)
Date of the offer: 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SSE L64
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: 60L (employer PF included)
Signing Bonus: 12L (1st year) + 6L (2nd year)
Relocation : n/a
RSU: $180K for 4 years
Perf Bonus: Upto 30% of base, considering 15% ~ 9L
Benefits: Standard MS benefits like car lease policy, food coupons etc
Total comp for 1 st year - 1.18 cr

Interview Experience - https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5277284/Microsoft-or-L64-or-Offer

Tried negotiating once to increase RSUs but MS did not budge. I don't have a competing offer but some personal need to change job so accepted.
